thread.title: Julie ffitch
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Julie ffitch

author: Julie ffitch
title: Julie ffitch
text: Delighted with my recent purchase of a waxed jacket. Fits perfectly and is very well made. Great attention to detail. I loved the pen to name it and the pin button. Thank you. The delivery was swift and the coat was beautifully packed. This was my first experience of this company and would not hesitate to use them again.
